text.div:
BC DegreeOfLymphaticInvolvementCS CodeSystem

Value set containing the degree of lymphatic involvement.

name: DegreeOfLymphaticInvolvementCS
title: BC DegreeOfLymphaticInvolvementCS CodeSystem
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC).
description: Value set containing the degree of lymphatic involvement.

concept.definition: Only a few cancer cells are in the node.
concept.display: Only a few cancer cells are in the node.

concept.definition: The cancer can be seen or felt without aid of microscopy.
concept.display: The cancer can be seen or felt without aid of microscopy.

concept.definition: Cancer has spread outside the wall of the node.
concept.display: Cancer has spread outside the wall of the node.
